title: Fatal error when calling internal method during property set checks
body:
```
$ git clone git@github.com:sebastianbergmann/phpunit.git
$ cd phpunit
$ composer install
$ cd ..
```
```
$ git clone git@github.com:vimeo/psalm.git
$ cd psalm
$ composer install
$ cd ..
```
```
$ cd phpunit
$ ../psalm/psalm --init
$ ../psalm/psalm --stats
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...
PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught UnexpectedValueException: Could not find file for exception in /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Scanner.php:256
Stack trace:
#0 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(786): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Scanner->getClassLikeFilePath('exception')
#1 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(811): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->getFileAnalyzerForClassLike('Exception')
#2 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/CallAnalyzer.php(198): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->getMethodMutations('Exception::gett...', Object(Psalm\Context), '/usr/local/src/...', 'src/Framework/U...')
#3 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Call/MethodCallAnalyzer.php(864): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\CallAnalyzer::collectSpecialInformation(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\MethodAnalyzer), 'getTrace', Object(Psalm\Context))
#4 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Ana in /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Scanner.php on line 256

Fatal error: Uncaught UnexpectedValueException: Could not find file for exception in /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Scanner.php:256
Stack trace:
#0 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(786): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Scanner->getClassLikeFilePath('exception')
#1 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(811): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->getFileAnalyzerForClassLike('Exception')
#2 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/CallAnalyzer.php(198): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->getMethodMutations('Exception::gett...', Object(Psalm\Context), '/usr/local/src/...', 'src/Framework/U...')
#3 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Call/MethodCallAnalyzer.php(864): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\CallAnalyzer::collectSpecialInformation(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\MethodAnalyzer), 'getTrace', Object(Psalm\Context))
#4 /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Ana in /usr/local/src/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Scanner.php on line 256
```
